skin.title: Redox Skin
skin.description: Properties that address the look of the app.

spacing-values-OFF.shortcut: @base-[ v[ -large[ r, st ] , -small[ er, est ], h..., top..., bottom..., left..., right... ]

location-size-values.shortcut: @base-[ top [ -large[ r, st ] , -small[ er, est ], bottom..., left..., right... ]

breakpoint-values.shortcut: @base-[ small[ min, max] , medium[ min, max] , large[ min, max] ]

position-names.shortcut: @base-[ top, bottom, left, right, top-[left, right], bottom-[left, right]]

transition-core-values.shortcut: @base-[ all, none, width, height, left, right, top, bottom ]

color-values.shortcut: @base-[ light[ er, est ], dark[ er, est ] ]

size-values.shortcut: @base-[ large[ r, st ] , small[ er, est ] ]

simple-position-names.shortcut: @base-[ top, bottom, left, right, top-[left, right], bottom-[left, right]]

overflow-values.shortcut: @base-[ visible, hidden, scroll, auto, initial, inherit ]

atoms.mixins_string:
@mixin a-background-secondaryNavBGColor ( $secondaryNavBGColor : #eee  ) {
 background-color : $secondaryNavBGColor; }

atoms.name: mainNavHeight
atoms.mixins_string:
@mixin a-main-nav-height ( $mainNavHeight : $row-3  ) {
 height : $mainNavHeight; }

atoms.name: mainNavHeightInv
atoms.mixins_string:
@mixin a-height-minus-main-nav-height ( $mainNavHeight : $row-3  ) {
  @include a-height-minus-row( $mainNavHeight );  }

utilities.name: flex-center
utilities.mixins_string:
@mixin a-flex-center ( $val:null  ) {
 justify-content: center;  & > * { align-self: center; }  @include a-display-flex;  }
mixins_array:
@mixin a-flex-center ( $val:null  ) {
 justify-content: center;  & > * { align-self: center; }  @include a-display-flex;  }

utilities.name: transform-center
utilities.css_string: .a-transform-center {  top: 50%;  left: 50%;  -ms-transform: translateY(-50%) translateX(-50%);  transform: translateY(-50%) translateX(-50%);  }
css_array: .a-transform-center {  top: 50%;  left: 50%;  -ms-transform: translateY(-50%) translateX(-50%);  transform: translateY(-50%) translateX(-50%);  }
utilities.mixins_string:
@mixin a-transform-center ( $val:null  ) {
 top: 50%;  left: 50%;  -ms-transform: translateY(-50%) translateX(-50%);  transform: translateY(-50%) translateX(-50%);  }
mixins_array:
@mixin a-transform-center ( $val:null  ) {
 top: 50%;  left: 50%;  -ms-transform: translateY(-50%) translateX(-50%);  transform: translateY(-50%) translateX(-50%);  }

utilities.name: clear-fix
utilities.mixins_string:
@mixin a-clear-fix ( $val:null  ) {
 &:before, &:after { content: " "; display: table; }  &:after { clear: both; }  }
mixins_array:
@mixin a-clear-fix ( $val:null  ) {
 &:before, &:after { content: " "; display: table; }  &:after { clear: both; }  }
